verses.plain: Unto thee will I cry, O LORD my rock; be not silent to me: lest, if thou be silent to me, I become like them that go down into the pit.

tokens.t: Unto thee will I cry, O
my rock; be not silent to me: lest,
thou be silent to me, I become like them that go down into the pit.

verses.plain: Hear the voice of my supplications, when I cry unto thee, when I lift up my hands toward thy holy oracle.

tokens.t: Hear the voice of my supplications, when I cry unto thee, when I lift up my hands toward thy holy oracle.

verses.plain: Draw me not away with the wicked, and with the workers of iniquity, which speak peace to their neighbours, but mischief is in their hearts.

tokens.t: Draw me not away with the wicked, and with the workers of iniquity, which speak peace to their neighbours, but mischief

verses.plain: Give them according to their deeds, and according to the wickedness of their endeavours: give them after the work of their hands; render to them their desert.

tokens.t: Give them according to their deeds, and according to the wickedness of their endeavours: give them after the work of their hands; render to them their desert.

verses.plain: Because they regard not the works of the LORD, nor the operation of his hands, he shall destroy them, and not build them up.

tokens.t: Because they regard not the works of the
, nor the operation of his hands, he shall destroy them, and not build them up.

verses.plain: Blessed be the LORD, because he hath heard the voice of my supplications.

tokens.t: , because he hath heard the voice of my supplications.

verses.plain: The LORD is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.

tokens.t: my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.

verses.plain: The LORD is their strength, and he is the saving strength of his anointed.

tokens.t: the saving strength of his anointed.

verses.plain: Save thy people, and bless thine inheritance: feed them also, and lift them up for ever.

tokens.t: Save thy people, and bless thine inheritance: feed them also, and lift them up for ever.

footnotes.text: thy…: or, the oracle of thy sanctuary
